bwwExcerpt: I've seen angrier Vanyas (Roger Allam), more melancholy Vanyas (Simon Russell Beale). I'm not sure I've seen any better catch the tragicomic mixture of fury and futility when - re-roused to ire at talk of the estate being sold-off - Jones's frantically unhappy nobody runs amok with a gun, then subsides into stunned apathy.
